name: autographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of writing) in someone's own handwriting: Some of the letters were dictated, but others were written autographically.
More examplesFewer examplesThe expression "mea mano" (with my own hand) is an indication that the document was written autographically. The signatures of the councilmen were autographically reproduced.Time keepers should sign every time sheet autographically.In Roman times, it was usual for authors to dictate to a scribe, but some authors preferred to write a portion of a letter, or a whole letter, autographically.
